name: Interstellar Pig's Home Run Derby
description:
A Global Game Jam project from a while back. 
Swing the bat of the Interstellar pig and try to hit the ball.

I created the art for it in photoshop. 


ARROW LEFT- and ARROW RIGHT, or W and D - Move left and Right.
W or SPACE - Swing the bat.

The coding was by; 

bobby5892,
Gordon Wallace, and 

Jack Kimball

The Main GGJ site is here.
[https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/interstellar-pigs-home-run-derby]
